visualizations.title: Actual vs Predicted Values
visualizations.description: Comparison of actual and predicted crop yields with perfect prediction line

visualizations.title: Residual Distribution
visualizations.description: Distribution of prediction errors (residuals) across samples

data.summary: Linear regression model fails to capture crop yield patterns with current features. High prediction errors and negative R² indicate severe underfitting. Model requires more data, feature engineering, or alternative algorithms.
data.task_answer: The linear regression model fails to predict crop yield accurately with current features. Model performance metrics indicate severe underfitting and inability to capture yield patterns from the available predictors.
